body.name: FISHBOT 1080P Smart Video Doorbell Camera Wireless with Ring Chime, AI Human Detection, 2-Way Audio, Night Vision, Cloud Storage, 100% Wire-Free, Battery Powered, Indoor Outdoor Surveillance
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 47 mins
features: Artificial Intelligence for Human Detection: Our AI-powered tech precisely recognizes humans, discarding inconsequential motion from cars and trees.

Secure and Reliable Cloud Storage: Our AES-128 encrypted cloud storage with optional subscription (available separately) enhances your experience. A 30-day free trial is available for continuous recording and sharing.
Real-time 2-Way Interaction: Engage with visitors on-the-go, no matter your location.
Superior Night Vision: Six IR lights combined with a smart sensor provide high-resolution 1080P video recording even in dim conditions, ensuring round-the-clock security.
Intelligent Motion Alerts: Receive instant notifications on your smartphone upon detecting motion, staying updated on the happenings at your doorstep.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1080p Intelligent AI Wireless Doorbell Cam Precision Wide-Field Lens Harness the wide-angle feature to get lucid and meticulous live or playback videos.

Key Features Human Detection & Smart Motion Notifications Get immediate alerts on your phone when motion is detected, keeping you abreast of activities at your entrance. Real-time 2-Way Interaction Engage with visitors on-the-go, no matter your location. Advanced Night Vision 4 infrared lights coupled with a responsive sensor offer clear video capture in low light, assuring 24/7 security.

Enhanced Chime for Added Convenience Place the bundled doorbell chime in areas like the dining room, kitchen, or balcony for immediate notifications. Link several chimes to one doorbell for greater flexibility. Robust IP65 Weatherproofing The doorbell, with its IP65 rating, stands strong against varied weather patterns, assuring consistent protection. Safe & Trustworthy Cloud Storage Benefit from AES-128 encrypted cloud storage with an optional subscription (sold separately). Enjoy a 30-day free trial for uninterrupted recording and sharing options.

Useful Tips Charge with Ease: Before the doorbell's first activation, remove the back's insulation tape and ensure a thorough charge. Powering can be done using the USB cable in the box and a fitting DC 5V 1A or 5V 2A adapter (not provided in the set).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Affordable Camera
reviews.reviewText: The camera quality on this is Amazing! Extremely clear for the price. I took a chance with this over a Ring Brand and I’m very impressed and relieved to have such good quality for half the price. Install was easy and it charged very quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great view! Wide and clear. Motion detection and sensor work great and the app is so easy to use. Installation id a breeze. For the price point, highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great camera can install almost anywhere
reviews.reviewText: i love that its wireless, it was easy to setup, just download app and it takes a few minutes then your good to go, i installed it on deck post so it faces the back door, it can also be moved anywhere around the house, even inside. would recommend this camera to anyone looking for security and its a great price. Im very pleased with this fishbot camera and i will be getting another one for the side of the house, what a great way to secure your home

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality video feed
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up simple to mount reliable and affordable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The clarity is AMAZING!
reviews.reviewText: I love this doorbell camera. It was easy to setup and easy to install. The picture is extremely clear and not only records motion but also has a live feed of the cameras view. I’m definitely getting another one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and works well
reviews.reviewText: I received this today, charged it up and installed it. It was easy to install and works well. I live in a rural area and I was worried that a doorbell camera wouldn't give me a good view of the area. I am amazed at how large an area is covered by the camera. I'm also pleased with how well the audio works. The only thing that could be improved would be to have more documentation on how to use the app.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product at a great price
reviews.reviewText: The doorbell camera exceeded my expectations especially for the price. Works great and easy to setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up. Nice clear picture even at night
reviews.reviewText: Very nice camera I was worried it would keep going off because of our wind chimes but it's ai feature only records people. Also when I bought it I was curious about how much the subscription was and I couldn't find an answer. It's 29.99 for a year. Not too bad. The pictures are clear the video is great. I have no complaints so far.
